questions.question: What is the predominant color of the bottle containing the supplement?
What material appears to constitute the primary packaging of this product?
What is the overall shape of the container holding the dietary supplement?
What color is the cap or lid on top of the supplement bottle?
What kind of seal is visibly present on the supplement bottle's cap?
Considering the label, what is one of the main ingredients or components advertised?
What type of label design or style is predominantly visible on the product?
What is the color of the text predominantly displayed on the label?
Based on the labeling, what is the product's intended use or purpose?
What is the overall condition of the bottle (i.e., used, damaged, etc.)?
What manufacturing practice standard appears to be claimed by the product?
Is there any recycling symbol present on the bottle's label?
Considering the visible text, is this a single-herb or blended supplement?
Does the bottle exhibit any noticeable wear and tear, scuff marks, or cracks?
What is the general appearance of the text on the bottle's label (e.g., bold, faint)?
